rules_text:
If there are two or more +1/+1 counters on this creature, it has trample. If there are five or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has “{T}: This creature fights target creature.”
Evolve [i](Whenever one of your creatures enters, if it has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
